message: If you like baseball you will love the 1994 Ken Burnes documentary titled "Baseball" from netflix: Award-winning documentarian Ken Burns takes a swing at a unique and much-loved aspect of life in the United States -- baseball -- chronicling the sport's signature people, places and events as well as its deep-rooted relationship to American culture. The pastime's century-and-a-half history unfolds over ten nostalgic, informative "innings," which delve into baseball's spiritual resonance with the entire nation.
Looks like its going to be pretty good. Can't wait.
